::Prowl::

Prowl's feet screech to a stop as he hears a thud ahead of him, 
wondering what it could be. Glancing around for a second, he takes off 
running again. He was beginning to get lightheaded from lack of fluid, 
as well as from the constant pain in his arm and chest.

His eyes widen as he sees Iron Raptor hobble around the corner, Prowl 
running toward her, his eyes concerned.

"Are you allright, love?" he says, breathing heavily.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
